title: Convolutional Neural Network
description: Created a Grah Convolution Neural Network (GCNN) to classify antibiotic molecules based on their efficacy. Trained the model on a large dataset of 20,000 molecules using Python in Google Colab.

title: Investigation Of The Pagerank Algorithm
description: Researched the mathematical fundamentals of Google's famous Pagerank algorithm. Recreated the algorithm using MATLAB software. Used data visualization and analysis in Python to convey the results.

title: Quantum Circuits C++ Project
description: Created a C++ program to simulate quantum circuits. The program can simulate the effects of quantum gates on qubits and can also simulate the effects of quantum entanglement.

title: Subway Surfers Screen Reader Chrome Extension
description: Made a screen reader chrome extension which used mozilla/readability.js and the chrome text to speech api.
